metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Other Friends - Steven Universe is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Other Friends - Steven Universe has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and E Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
